remarks: If all functions of a finite set of functions over the nonnegative integers are finitely supported, then the support of all these functions is contained in a finite set of sequential integers starting at 0 and ending with the supremum of the union of the support of these functions.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Oct-2019.)
